alert.note: Alert for Ingham (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 10:50AM EST until February 20 at 8:30AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Michigan... Sycamore Creek At Holt affecting Ingham County. Maple River at Maple Rapids affecting Clinton County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Michigan... Looking Glass River Near Eagle affecting Clinton County. .Heavy rain will fall on a deep primed snowpack leading to the melt increasing. Flows in rivers will increase quickly and reach critical levels. For the Sycamore Creek...including Holt...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Maple River...including Maple Rapids...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sycamore Creek At Holt. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Expect minor flooding of low lying areas adjacent to the river, in the Lansing Municipal Golf Course and sections of East Mt. Hope Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EST Friday the stage was 8.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM EST Friday was 8.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 4.7 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.6 feet on 03/05/1979. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/grr. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 1200 PM EST.
